DOC.brief_title: Estrogen Pretreatment Prior GnRH Antagonist Protocol
DOC.criteria: regular normoovulatory cycle ( 28 35 day ) age < 38 year , body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 first second IVF/ICSI attempt high basal level serum FSH E2 , less 5 follicle antral follicular count perform day 3 spontaneous cycle , history high ( > 20 oocyte ) low ( < 5 oocyte ) ovarian response previous IVF attempt
